opening:
The unvierse is a wild, chaotic place.
Tyrannical empires, monstruous aliens, bloodthirst pirates, and the unforgiving vaccum make everything dangerous, makes every day uncertain.
Out of the chaos, forged in fire and blood, heroes arise.
You? You are one of them, and could very well be the greatest of them all; the true Defender of the Universe.
With a ship,a crew, your weapons and armor, and your own natural powers, you shall save panets, overthrow dictators, defeat horrific monsters, holdback the tide of evil, and bring peace and order to the universe.
You have 75 points.
Good luck, Hero.

choices.your_armor:
Your Armor
You stumbled upon an incredible suit of armor, one that is incredibly durable and has the firepower to rival and dreadnought. The suit seems to be powered by a strange, near-limitless cosmic energy.

-Power Armor is Free, Mech is 1/2 price
-All Restriction:Armor options are unlocked
choices.your_team:
Your Team
You and your crew are the biggest bad-asses in this super cluster. Each and every one of you are highly sought after by dozens of different governments, but you decided to band together and make a real difference.

-Your first two non-restricted Companions are Free
-All Restriction:Team options are unlocked
choices.your_ship:
Your Ship
Your ship truly is something else; no one you've ever brought it to has ever seen anything like it before. It's nigh-indestructible, faster than any other ship of its class, and it's inhabited by the most powerful A.I. ever found or made.

-All ship class costs are cut in half
-All Restriction:Team options are unlocked
choices.you:
You
You are a powerhouse, a living weapon, a one-person army. Nobody like you has ever existed before, you are a true outlier. What gives you this power, this cosmic might, is unknown.

-Peak Physical Fitness is Free
-All Restriction:You options are unlocked

human.text:
Human
Bipedal pursuit hunter, skilled with tools.
Max Lifespan of 135 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1100 lbs.
Max Speed of 30 mph.
Natural Environment is Varied; species is very adaptable and thrives in all climates except arid desert and frozen poles.

-Gain an extra 5 points.
-Gain Endurance for Free.

android.text:
Android
Bipedal synthetic organism, skilled with tech.
All Androids are sapient, and can feel the same sensations that organics feel.
Do not age with frequent repair and upkeep.
Max Lifting Strength of 1800 lbs.
Max speed of 40 mph.
Natural Environment is Cold and Dry.

-Gain Tech Skills for Free.
-Gain Cybernetics (x4) for Free.

asari.text:
Asari
Bipedal Mono-sexed psionics.
Max Lifespan of 900-1000 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1000 lbs.
Max Speed of 28 mph.
Natural Environment is Tropical, but are almost as adaptable as humans.

-Gain Beautiful for Free.
-Gain Psionic for Free.

gray.text:
Gray
Bald, gray skinned humanoids with large brains.
Developed advanced anti-gravity tech.
Large height range in Males: 3-6 feet tall.
Females are taller: 6-7 feet.
Max Lifespan of 210 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 900 lbs.
Max Speed of 27 mph.
Natural Environment is Dry and Arid.

-Gain Intelligence for Free.

aquoid.text:
Aquoid
Bipedal aquatic humanoids, genetic engineers.
Possess two repository systems.
Max Lifespan of 120 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1300 lbs.
Max Speed of 35 mph.
Natural Environment is Tropical waters.
Natural Depth is between 300 and 1000 feet.

-Gain Immune for Free.
-Gain Enhanced Senses for Free.

qunari.text:
Qunari
Bipedal metallic-skinned horned warriors.
Rigid, militaristic, hyper-socialist society.
Most clothes are traditional and revealing.
Average height of 6'10.
Max Lifespan of 150 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1600 lbs.
Max Speed of 35 mph.
Natural Environments is Hot and Tropical.

-Gain Combat Training for Free

abilities.opening: Abilities

beloved.text:
Beloved (Cost: 2 Points)
You are naturally charismatic, and people naturally enjoy your pressence. Also, you're something of an intergalactic celebrity.
But you're more than just popular; you're inspiring. People are much more likely to help you or assist you.
Your team is more loyal to you now.

psionics.text:
Psionics (Cost: 4 Points)
You can telekinetically lift and move objects up to 3x your race's max lifting strength. You can also form a psychic link through physical contact, allowing you to share emotions and memories with a person, and you can generate psionic barriers that protect against attacks.

combat_training.text:
Combat Training (Cost: 3 Points)
You have gone through the best your race has to offer in standard combat training.You know how to fire, clean, and maintain any firearm, drive any vehicle, and survive in prolonged combat.Also, your current strength is boosted to l/2 of your race's max strength, if it wasn't already.

endurance.text:
Endurance (Cost: 2 Points)
You have some of the best endurance in the galaxy.
You could jog for dozens of miles without a break, go days without sleep, food, or water, and you only need to sleep for about 4-5 hours a night.

tech_skills.text:
Tech Skills (Cost: 2 Points)
You are naturally skilled with electronics and technology.
You’re an expert hacker, you have advanced knowledge in and experience with engineering, and you’re far more skilled with energy weapons.

cybernetics.text:
Cybernetics (Cost: 1 Point)
One of your limbs has been replaced with a cybernetic prosthetic.
This cybernetic limb can exert twice as much force as a standard limb. However, these limbs need to be repaired regularly, and unless you upgrade, you can’t get stronger. This can be taken up to 4 times.

enhanced_senses.text:
Enhanced Senses (Cost: 2 Points)
With genetic and/or cybernetic engineering, your senses have been boosted.You can now see in the dark, your vision can pick out details from dozens of meters away, and you could hear a pin drop in a crowded room.

intelligence.text:
Intelligence (Cost: 3 Points)
You are a natural genius. In human terms, you have an I.Q. of around 150, and you have a photographic memory.
You are also naturally inventive, and you have a natural talent for theoretical physics and advanced mathematics.

beautiful.text:
Beautiful (Cost: 2 Points)
Your physical appearance turns heads everywhere you go.
Even people who aren't your own species are usually attracted to you.
For Androids; you look and feel far more lifelike.You could even have some of the right..‘parts’ installed.

special_ops.text:
Special Ops (Cost: 4 Points)
Requires Combat Training
You are one of the elite.
You have been heavily trained in unconventional warfare.
You are a master of sabotage, assassination, espionage, and you excel in high-risk combat situations.

peak_physical_fitness.text:
Peak Physical Fitness (Cost: 4 Points)
Your lifting strength, speed, and lifespan are boosted to that of your race’s maximum.
You are the best your species has to offer.

immune.text:
Immune (Cost: 2 Points)
Thanks to genetic engineering, you heal 30% faster than normal people, and your immune system is much tougher.
You also have no genetic or birth defects.
Cannot be taken by androids.

medical_expert.text:
Medical Expert (Cost: 3 Points)
You have a doctorate in a medical field of your choice from a prestigious university.
You know how to perform first aid and use advanced medical technology.

piloting.text:
Piloting (Cost: 2 Points)
You graduated with top marks from your race’s best piloting academy.
You are an expert pilot with every manner of spacecraft

diplomatic.text:
Diplomatie (Cost: 2 Points)
You are an expert negotiator.
You could talk your way out of or through a hostage situation, a kidnapping, or a business deal.
You could be an amazing politician, and perhaps you were at one point.

hidden_weapon.text:
Hidden Weapons (Cost: 2 Points)
Requires Cybernetics
For each cybernetic limb you have, you can hide one of the following retractable weapons in it:
a pistol
a hyper-durable blade
a short-range flamethrower
a buzz saw

psionic_enhancement.text:
Psionic Enhancement (Cost: 2 Points)
(Requires: Psionics)
Your psionics can now boost your running speed by 10 mph, you can jump twice as far and high, and you can use psionics to temporarily boost your healing by up to 50%.

elementalism.text:
Elementalism (Cost: 1 Point)
Through either tech or psionics, you can heat up or cool down objects through touch, generate small to medium sized flames, create balls of ice, and generate the same amount of electricity as a taser.

precision.text:
Precision (Cost: 2 Points)
Both you and your hands are always steady and precise.This makes you a far better shot, and it’s easier to perform surgery or sautering.
With Psionics, you can carefully move delicate objects, unlock doors, and even snap bones from a distance.

rage.text:
Rage (Cost: 3 Points)
Through sheer determination and unbridled rage, you can ignore pain, you are harder to knock unconscious, and you absolutely refuse to die. If someone buried you alive, you would force yourself to dig your way out, no matter how deep down you are.

super_soldier.text:
Super Soldier (Restriction:You) (Cost: 6 Points)
You can now lift over 5x your races max lifting strength, run at over 55 mph, and you heal 2x faster than normal.You are also now an expert marksman, your skin is tougher, and your reflexes are faster. If you lose a limb, a tooth, or an organ, it will slowly regrow and repair.

superhuman.text:
Superhuman (Restriction:You) (Cost: 6 Points)
Requires Psionics Your psionic powers are now so intense that you can lift up to 25 tons with them.
You can generate barriers so large they encompass ships, crush normal people into paste, and you can even fly using your telekinesis.

armored.text:
Armored (Restriction:You) (Cost: 6 Points)
Most of your chest and head have been replaced with unique, alien cybernetics, and nanobots flow through your blood. All of your mechanical parts automatically and rapidly repair, and your healing is boosted to 5x faster than normal.
All of your cybernetics are now tough enough to stop bullets.

synergy.text:
Synergy (Restriction:Team) (Cost: 5 Points)
You and your teammates somehow have an unconscious psychic link; you all seem to know where the others are, even across light years.
You also sync up unbelievably well; you all can come up with and follow unspoken plans on the fly. Your team is unspeakably loyal to you, and you can sense each other’s injures.

armor.opening:
Armor
You can choose EITHER the Mech or the PA

space_suit.text:
Space Suit (Cost: Free)
Kevlar suit with ceramic armor, has mag boots.
Light and fast, no strength boost.
Has a magnetic clamp on each arm and leg, and two on the back, which connect to your weapons.
Has communication systems in the helmet.
Can fit 4 traits.
You can have the Space Suit and one other suit.
For Androids; incorporate all of your Space Suit traits into your body.

powered_armor.text:
Powered Armor (Cost: 4 Points)
Heavy suit, titanium-based alloy, vacuum-sealed.
5 inches taller than you.
Allows you to carry 1,000 lbs more than you previously could.
Needs to be recharged after 6 hours of use.
Has magnetic clamps for large weapons and internal compartments for small weapons.
Can fit 8 traits.

mech_suit.text:
Mech Suit (Cost: 8 Points)
11 ft tall armored suit.
Slow, big, and durable.
Allows you to carry up to 10,000 lbs.
Needs to be recharged after 3 hours of use.
Has internal compartments for weapons.
Can fit 12 traits.

nanobots.text:
Nanobots (Cost: 1 Point)
Your armor repairs itself slowly thanks to a cluster of nanobots that are released when the armor is damaged.

survivalist.text:
Survivalist (Cost: 1 Point)
Your armor houses dozens of small, retractable tools, including a knife, a blowtorch, a flare gun, a taser, various wrenches, screwdrivers, pliers, scissors, and more.
Your helmet also has night-vision and thermal imaging.

dr_armor.text:
Dr. Armor (Cost: 1 Point)
Your suit's medical suite carries healing gel, your armor can lock up limbs when it detects broken bones, it dispenses adrenaline and electric shocks when it detects heart failure, it can administer local anesthetics, and if you have an A.I, this suite is controlled by it.

collapsible.text:
Collapsible (Cost: 1 Point)
Your suit can easily snap together, and each piece can be collapsed into a small, light frame, and parts of your suit can be rolled back easily.
Your suit is much easier to hide and carry. For Mechs, this allows your suit to get much smaller for transport.

enhanced_servos.text:
Enhanced Servos (Cost: 2 Points)
Powerful servos in your arms and legs boosts your strength in suit.
For Space Suit, you can carry 400 lbs more.
For Powered Armor, you can carry 800 lbs more.
For Mech, you can carry 1,400 lbs more.

enhanced_shell.text:
Enhanced Shell (Cost: 2 Points)
Your suit's armor is replaced with a stronger, more durable substance, while also maintaining the same weight

enhanced_size.text:
Enhanced Size (Cost: 2 Points)
Mech Only
Your suit is much bigger;
now your Mech is 50 feet tall, and can carry 3x as much as before.

energy_systems.text:
Energy Systems (Cost: 1 Point)
Your suit is now run by a powerful, clean, efficient energy source.
Power Armor and Mech have miniaturized reactors on them now.
You could stay in your suit for hours, even days on end, and your suit is hardened against EMPs.

elemental_gauntlets.text:
Elemental Gauntlets (Cost: 1 Point)
Your gauntlets can fire streams, blasts, and Jets of fire, ice, and electricity.

kinetic_gauntlets.text:
Kinetic Gauntlets (Cost: 1 Point)
Your gauntlets can fire blasts of kinetic force, allowing you to send shockwaves through the air or ground, knocking enemies back and off their feet.
This also significantly enhances your punches.

energy_gauntlets.text:
Energy Gauntlets (Cost: 2 Points)
You can fire blasts of energy from the palms of your hands.
These blasts carry heat, and can knock an armored human off their feet.This is effective against armored opponents, as the blasts cut through armor.

firepower.text:
Firepower (Cost: 2 Points)
For Space Suits, you have a hidden machine gun in each gauntlet.
For PAs, you have the above and hidden missile launchers in your shoulder plates.
For Mechs, you have the above and a mounted minigun that slides out of your left: shoulder.

kinetic_shield.text:
Kinetic Shield (Cost: 1 Point)
These shields automatically deflect any object with sufficient speed.
It will activate to deflect anything from crossbow bolts to bullets.
It does not block energy blasts, lasers, or immense heat, although energy weapons are rare, and are typically restricted for military use.

energy_shield.text:
Energy Shield (Cost: 2 Points)
These shields are stronger than kinetic shields, but take up more power.
They block both kinetic and energy weapons, and have some effect against immense heat and radiation.

hardlight_shield.text:
Hardlight Shield (Cost: 1 Point)
These close-range shields will activate if anyone gets too close.
They are decent against guns, but are more suited towards close quarter combat as they hold closer to the body and block both punches and melee attacks.

smart_armor.text:
Smart Armor (Cost: 2 Points)
Insulated, heat-resistant armor plating that detects incoming strikes and locks up and hardens to absorb the impact

tentacle.text:
Tentacle (Cost: 2 Points)
Your suit houses a single, retractable metal tentacle that can extend from your back up to 4 feet, and can be used as an extra limb, a weapon, or can be used with your hacking.
Mechs can extend up to 10 feet, and have two tentacles.

jump_jets.text:
Jump Jets (Cost: 2 Points)
You can launch yourself up to 30 feet forward and into the air thanks to these jets on your boots and back.You can also use these to move around in zero-G.
The distance is doubled for powered armors, and tripled for mechs.

stealth.text:
Stealth (Cost: 2 Points)
Your suit muffles your footsteps and noises you make. It also comes with a built-in cloaking field that turns you invisible for a brief time.
This works on cameras, but you can still be picked up by motion detectors unless you have a cyberwarfare suite.

cyberwarfare_suite.text:
Cyberwarfare Suite (Cost: 1 Point)
Your suit has hacking systems that can be used to get through locked doors, disable security cameras and drones, and make armors malfunction.Your A.I. will control this suite if you have one.

super_suit.text:
Super Suit (Cost: 6 Points)
(Restriction: Armor)
PA or Mech only
Your strength in armor is boosted to the point where you could lift a frigate by yourself, and your built-in weapons are now strong enough to rival battleships. Your suit is also built out of hypermatter, making it extremely durable and it repairs itself over time.

advanced_flight.text:
Advanced Flight (Cost: 6 Points)
(Restriction: Armor)
Requires Jump Jets
PA or Mech only
Your armor can fly under its own power for days, and it can fly faster than any spaceship, as well as being capable of FTL jumps.
Your suit is durable enough to withstand and protect you from these speeds, as well as extreme heat.

psychic_link.text:
Psychic Link (Cost: 6 Points)
(Restriction: Armor)
PA or Mech only
You can remotely, psychically connect to your armor, even across light years, and command it to come to you, wherever you are.
You also can activate your suit’s functions with just a thought, and your suit is now unhackable.

amplifier.text:
Amplifier (Restriction:You)
(Costs: 5 Points)
Requires Psionics
Your suit now syncs up to your body, amplifying your psionic abilities.
Now, when you are in your suit you can lift and throw twice as much with your psionics, and your barriers can withstand ship-grade weaponry.

hardlight_blade.name: Hardlight Blade
hardlight_blade.text:
Hardlight Blade (Cost: 1 Point)
A blade of hardlight that you can project from your suit.
This blade is superheated, and can carve through bodies easily.

phaser.name: Phaser
phaser.text:
Phaser (Cost: 1 Point)
A rechargeable energy weapon that interacts with its targets nervous system, and can be set to stun, knock out or kill.

pulse_rifle.name: Pulse Rifle
pulse_rifle.text:
Puise Rifle (Cost: 1 Point) This assault rifle fires tiny balls of energy at an extremely fast rate, this gives it low accuracy and moderate kickback.
Very good against shields.

heavy_flamethrower.name: Heavy Flamethrower
heavy_flamethrower.text:
Heavy Flamethrower (Cost: 1 Point)
This flamethrower generates a powerful jet of plasma, incinerating everything within a 12 foot cone of the nozzle.

kinetic_staff.name: Kinetic Staff
kinetic_staff.text:
Kinetic Staff (Cost: 2 Points)
This staff, when the end is slammed into a person or a surface, generates a blast of kinetic energy that sends people flying back.

pulse_pistols.name: Pulse Pistols
pulse_pistols.text:
Pulse Pistols (Cost: 2 Points)
These pistols fire tiny balls of energy at an extremely fast rate.
Thus, these pistols have low accuracy but minimal kickback.
Very good against shields.

mag.name: MAG
mag.text:
MAG (Cost: 2 Points)
This assault rifle uses magnets to accelerate bullets like a rail gun.
Has more kickback than most assault rifles, and hard to aim without a lot of strength, but hits like a sniper rifle.

heavy_cryo_cannon.name: Heavy Cryo Cannon
heavy_cryo_cannon.text:
Heavy Cryo Cannon (Cost: 2 Points)
Fires balls of super-cooled goo that sticks to and instantly freezes onto any surface it hits.
Can cause hypothermia, frostbite, and death.

mono_molecular_blade.name: Mono-molecular Blade
mono_molecular_blade.text:
Mono-molecular Blade (Cost: 2 Points)
This hyper-thin blade is only a molecule thick, allowing it to cut through most armors with ease.

tiger_sharks.name: Tiger Sharks
tiger_sharks.text:
Tiger Sharks (Cost: 2 Points)
Collapsible, easy to conceal energy pistols.
Balances firing speed and impact power.
Good accuracy, low recoil.

falcon_sniper_rifle.name: Falcon Sniper Rifle
falcon_sniper_rifle.text:
Falcon Sniper Rifle (Cost: 2 Points)
Collapsible and easy to carry sniper rifle.
Uses mass alteration fields to fire a tiny shred of metal at a small fraction of the speed of light

pulse_grenade_launcher.name: Pulse Grenade Launcher
pulse_grenade_launcher.text:
Pulse Grenade Launcher (Cost: 2 Points)
Fires mini-pulse grenades that explode in a fireball of plasma.

plasma_blade.name: Plasma Blade
plasma_blade.text:
Plasma Blade (Cost: 3 Points)
This powerful energy weapon is easy to conceal, as it is just a handle until it is activated.
The 3-foot long plasma blades cut through bodies, armor, and shields with relative ease.

magnum.name: Magnum
magnum.text:
Magnum (Cost: 3 Points)
Slow-firing pistol, fires a powerful blast of energy every 2 seconds.

puma_energy_rifle.name: PUMA Energy Rifle
puma_energy_rifle.text:
PUMA Energy Rifle (Cost: 3 Points)
Long range energy rifle.
Fires bolts of plasma faster than a sniper, but is slower and more powerful than an assault rifle.

large_pulse_laser.name: Large Pulse Laser
large_pulse_laser.text:
Large Pulse Laser (Cost: 3 Points)
Heavy single-barreled laser cannon.
Very hard to aim. but chews through armor like paper.
Can be mounted onto a suit of Powered Armor by sliding it over one of the hands.

uber_blade.name: Uber Blade
uber_blade.text:
Über Blade (Cost: 3 Points)
This blade is not only incredibly durable and extremely sharp, but a generator in the hilt causes the blade to vibrate at high frequencies, so when it hits a person, it tears right through them.

the_panther.name: The Panther
the_panther.text:
The Panther (Cost: 3 Points)
A long-range, high-powered energy pistol.
This pistol fires very quietly, making it great for stealth.

particle_beam_rifle.name: Particle Beam Rifle
particle_beam_rifle.text:
Particle Beam Rifle (Cost: 3 Points)
This rifle fires a beam of energy that can hold steady for up to 8 seconds.
It does immense damage against both shields and armor.

heavy_minigun.name: Heavy Minigun
heavy_minigun.text:
Heavy Minigun (Cost: 3 Points)
Much lighter and sleeker than the miniguns of old, but still weighs a couple dozen pounds.
Chews through people.

frigate.text:
Frigate (Cost: 4 Points)
Fast and Light, meant more for stealth, scouting, extraction, search-and-rescue, etc.
Between 100 and 200 meters long.
Typically has 3-5 decks.
Can fit 6 traits and 1 main weapon.

cruiser.text:
Cruiser (Cost: 6 Points)
Larger than a frigate, very popular as it balances armor with speed.
Between 300 and 500 meters long.
Typically has 5-8 decks.
Can fit 8 traits and 1 main weapon.

battleship.text:
Battleship (Cost: 8 Points)
3/4ths the size of a dreadnought very large and very heavily armed, but still pretty slow and doesn’t have as much armor as the dreadnought.
Between 700 and 900 meters long.
Typically has 8-12 decks.
Can fit 10 traits and 1 main weapon.

dreadnought.text:
Dreadnought (Cost: 10 Points)
Biggest ship, other than Gray motherships. Slower than battleships, can’t land on most planets.
Immense armor and weaponry.
900+ meters, typical limit is 1800 meters.
Can fit 12 traits and 2 main weapons.

ship_style.opening:
Style
Choose one, your race's style is Free

human.text:
Human (Cost: 2 Points)
Blocky and gray, typically very militaristic.
Uses Kinetic Shields and Rail Guns (are Free).
Typical FTL speed is 18-20 LY per Day.

android.text:
Android (Cost: 2 Points)
Very utilitarian, focuses on function.
Uses Kinetic Shields and Particle Beams (are Free).
Typically employs swarms of unmanned fighters.
Typical FTL speed is 18-21 LY per day.

asari.text:
Asari (Cost: 2 Points)
Sleek, rounded, and lots of glowing lights.
Uses Energy Shields and Mass Accelerators (are Free).
Typical FTL speed is 18-22 LY per day.

gray.text:
Gray (Cost: 4 Points)
Disc shaped and intricate.
Uses Energy Shields and Particle Beams (are Free).
Has Gravity tech that allows for dreadnoughts to land on planets, and for tractor beams.
Typical FTL speed is 20-24 LY per day.

aquoid.text:
Aquoid (Cost: 2 Points)
Very organic and sea-animal shaped.
Built for deep oceans and deep space.
Uses Kinetic Shields and Mass Accelerators (are Free).
Typical FTL speed is 17-20 LY per Day.

qunari.text:
Qunari (Cost: 2 Points)
Long, angular, and sturdy.
Uses Energy Shields and Casaba Howitzers (are Free).
Typical FTL speed is 17-22 LY per day.

ship_traits.opening:
Ship Traits
Only once you spend points on an option, it becomes a Trait.

medical_bay.text:
Medical Bay
Has MRIs, medical scanners, automated surgery machines, and plenty of beds, as well as a stockpile of medication.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your medical center is 3x as big, and has organ cloners, stasis pods, and even accelerated healing pods.

mess_hall.text:
Mess Hall
Has enough metal tables to seat everyone, and has a decently sized kitchen and storeroom.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
Very fancy; tables are replaced with booths, there is now a bar. a large kitchen, and a 5-star chef.

crew_quarters.text:
Crew Quarters
Can house 4 Teammates
Your ship has a series of nice, single room cabins for your teammates, and two or three large communal rooms.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
Can house 6 more Teammates
Everyone has their own small but luxurious room.

recreational_rooms.text:
Recreational Rooms
You have a small library on board, as well as a rec room with movies, game tables, and video games.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your library is huge, housing thousands of paperbacks and tens of thousands of digital books.You also have a small movie theater on board.

shields.text:
Shields (Cost: 1 Point)
You gain one shield, choose between Energy or Kinetic.
Energy uses almost 2x as much power.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your shields are now layered.
Choose a second shield, you can have your second be the same shield as the first, if you want.

hull.text:
Hull
You have a tough, multi-layered hull, which protects against space dust, impacts, radiation, and heat. This includes a Whipple shield.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your main exterior hull is much more durable; made out of layered and pressed carbon nanotubes.

defenses.text:
Defenses
You gain two external point-defense turrets, and gain another two turrets for each ship size; Frigates get 2 total, etc.
Choose if Rail, Mass, Energy, or Laser.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
You gain an additional four turrets total, plus a swarm of 10 combat drones, and a swarm of 8 repair drones.

security.text:
Security (Cost: 1 Point)
You have two hidden turrets on each deck, and a team of 10 security officers.
Choose what races they are, you can choose Playable Races + Turian.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your security team is now heavily armed and armored, and you have at least 4 officers on each deck at all times.

crew.text:
Crew
You have a decently-sized crew of engineers, navigators, technicians, and maintenance. They are all your race.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
All of your crew mates are ex-military or otherwise skilled.They are also diverse, choose the species distribution
(Can only be Playable Races)

engines.text:
Engines
Your ship's thrusters push you through real space at thousands of miles an hour.
The exterior of your ship is covered in RCS thrusters for micro-adjustments.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your ship is now noticeably faster in real space, thanks to your upgraded thrusters.

hangar_bay.text:
Hangar Bay (Cost: 1 Point)
You gain a single hanger bay.This can hold shuttles, fighters, and vehicles.Your ship’s hangar bay can house any ship that is smaller than your ship’s size.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
You have multiple hangar bays, and you can hold twice as many shuttles and fighters.

training.text:
Training
You have a decent-sized shooting gallery on board for your crew mates, and you have a small gym for crew.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
You now have a holographic combat simulator that your crew mates can train in, and your gym is 2x larger.

particle_beam_cannon.text:
Particle Beam Cannon
(Cost: 1 Point)
Main Weapon
Fires a high-intensity beam of atomic particles at near-light speeds.This weapon causes superheating in its targets and impacts with over 150 terajoules of kinetic energy.
Can fire once per minute.

rail_gun.text:
Rail Gun (Cost: 1 Point)
Main Weapon
Uses a long series of magnets to accelerate a large, human-sized slug of metal to several hundred times the speed of sound. Impacts with about 70 terajoules of energy, and penetrates even the toughest armors. Can only fire once every 30 seconds.

mass_accelerator_cannon.text:
Mass Accelerator Cannon
(Cost: 1 Point)
Main Weapon
Uses Mass Alteration Fields to accelerate a soccer ball-sized slug of molten metal to a tiny fraction of the speed of light. Can fire every 12 seconds.
Has an impact yield in the low kilotons.

casaba_howitzer.text:
Casaba Howitzer (Cost: 1 Point)
The Nuclear Spear, Main Weapon.
This directed weapon fires a beam of pure nuclear fire and radiation. It tears through and cooks unshielded ships, and is decently effective against ground targets. Cheap, easy to use, and has an explosive yield in the low kilotons.
Can fire every 15 seconds.

armory.text:
Armory (Cost: 1 Point)
In the heart of your ship, you have a fortified room holding hundreds of advanced kinetic weapons, personal shield generators, and Space Suits.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
Your armory now holds energy weapons, as well as 12 Power Armor Suits for Crew usage.

stealth.text:
Stealth (Cost: 1 Point)
Your ship is outfitted with systems that mask your heat emissions and hide you from radar.
Your ship is also much quieter now.
Upgrade (Cost: 2 Points)
Your ship has a stealth field that renders it completely invisible.

life_support.text:
Life Support
When in atmosphere, your ship takes in large amounts of oxygen and water for crew use and heat regulation. You also have a hydroponics garden.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
Your hydroponics garden is 3x larger, and now grows fresh fruit and vegetables for your crew.

observation_decks.text:
Observation Decks (Cost: 1 Point)
Each deck of your ship has one room with a large, ceiling-to-floor window that looks out into space.Very tranquil.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
You now have two rooms per deck, and exterior cameras allow a 360, real-time image to be projected through holograms.

dropships.text:
Dropships (Requires Hangar Bay)
Your ship carries 2 state-of-the-art dropships that can carry up to 10 people, and have stealth and heavy weapons.
Upgrade (Cost: 1 Point)
Frigates get 2 more dropships. Cruisers get 4 more. Battleships get 6 more, and Dreadnoughts get 8 more.

fighter.text:
Fighter (Requires Hangar Bay)
(Cost: 1 Point)
This fighter can hold 3 people, and is very fast, lightly armored, has shields, and powerful weapons.These weapons are mini versions of your Main Weapon.
You gain 1 for Frigates, 4 for Cruisers, 8 for Battleships, and 12 for Dreadnoughts.

apcs.text:
APCs (Requires Hangar Bay)
(Cost: 1 Point) These armored, all-terrain APCs can carry up to 20 people, have shields, and have powerful anti-air guns and rocket launchers.
Frigates gain 2, Cruisers gain 5, Battleships gain 8, and Dreadnoughts gain 10.

hover_tanks.text:
Hover-Tanks (Requires Hangar Bay)
(Cost: 2 Points)
These AI controlled hover-tanks are fest over all terrains, armored, and carry missiles launchers, heavy mortars, machine guns, and shields.
You gain 2 for Frigates, and another 3 for each size, with Dreadnoughts receiving 11.

ai.text:
AI (Cost: 1 Point)
You gain a standard, human-level intellect AI.This AI helps maintain your ship’s systems, and can remotely interact with and monitor your suit’s systems.This AI can act as a Co-Pilot but CANNOT entirely replace a pilot with a body.
A quantum AI could replace a pilot.

cyberwarfare_suite.text:
Cyberwarfare Suite (Cost: 1 Point)
If you don’t have an AI, this is managed by a combination of auto systems and crew members.This suite helps defend your ship from hacking, and can hack into and disable missiles, enemy weapons, shields, and engines. A standard AI increases efficiency by 30%, a quantum AI increases it by 80%.

drones.text:
Drones (Cost: 1 Point)
Each level of ship gets +5 hover drones, with Frigates getting 5 and Dreadnoughts getting 20. Each drone has a gripping arm, a plasma torch, a kinetic shield, and storage space for up to 3 lbs of raw materials.These are used for dose-range attacks, gathering materials, and repairing your hull.

command_bridge.text:
Command Bridge (Cost: 1 Point for Frigates, free for all others)
Your ships cockpit is replaced with a command bridge, where you can view from your ship’s cameras and direct the entire crew.This is vital for larger ships, but more of a luxury for smaller ones.

built_to_last.text:
Built to Last (Free with Human Style)
(Cost: 1 Point)
Your ship is sturdy, and tough as nails.Your ship’s parts last longer and break down less often, saving you money and time on replacements and repairs.

skeleton_crew.text:
Skeleton Crew (Free with Android Style)
(Cost: 1 Point)
Thanks to the skill and efficiency of android crewmates, the number of crew members that you need to run the ship is cut down by 1/4th with no loss in efficiency, freeing up space.Your ship can hold 1 more teammate.

luxury.text:
Luxury (Free with Asari Style)
(Cost: 1 Point)
Your ship is always sleek, clean, and luxurious.
The rooms and food feel more like you’re living in a 5-star hotel than a warship.

grav_tech.text:
Grav-Tech (Free with Gray Style)
(Cost: 2 Points)
Your ship has powerful gravity systems that allow you to practically ignore powerful winds and storms, break free from strong gravity wells, and you have a tractor beam on board.

atmospheres.text:
Atmospheres (Free with Aquoid Style)
(Cost: 1 Point)
No matter what size your ship is; it’s fitted for travel in hostile, non-space environments.You can dive deep into the ocean, and your ship can survive higher amount of pressure and temperature.

efficiency.text:
Efficiency (Free with Qunari Style)
(Cost: 1 Point)
Your ship and crew are streamlined and trained to maximize efficiency.You use far less resources in everything from life support to weaponry and your crew responds much fester to surprises and threats.

hypernought.text:
Hypernought (Restriction: Ship)
(Cost: 6 Points)
Your ship is made up of a strange, alien metal that has never been seen before. It seems to be some form of Hypermatter. Your hull can block immense amounts of heat and radiation, and can endure huge amounts of damage. If the hull is ever breached, the hypermatter will repair itself within a day, with no need for any input of mass or energy.

superluminal.text:
Superluminal (Restriction: Ship)
(Cost: 6 Points)
Your ship’s FTL drive is upgraded as well; your ship can fly at around 3x the FTL speed that all other ships of your class and style fly at.Your ship is also equipped with a wormhole gate, which are huge space stations that allow travel to other galaxies, but yours is small enough to fit on your ship.

superweapon.text:
Superweapon (Restriction: Ship)
(Cost: 6 Points)
Your weapons are upgraded immensely.
Now your main weapon(s) yield is increased to somewhere in the upper megatons/petajoules.
Your main weapon is also now smaller, with no loss in power, so you can now pick a 2nd or even 3rd main weapon.

deus_ex_machina.text:
Deus Ex Machina (Restriction: Ship)
(Cost: 5 Points)
Your ship is inhabited and controlled by an immensely powerful quantum AI named Eve. She is truly unique. She can make tens of decillions of calculations in seconds, and her thoughts move faster than any organic, and most other Als as well. She is curious, inquisitive, loyal, quick-witted, and has a soothing voice.
She can project a hardlight form.

altean.text:
Altean
Alteans are native to Altea, a lush garden world.
Alteans are an advanced yet reclusive race of elf-like humanoids with psionic abilities. 70% of Alteans are Psionics, but only I/8th ofthat percentage possess telekinesis. For the others, their psionics manifest as the manipulation and even generation of: Fire/Heat, Ice/Cold, Water, Earth,Air, Life, or Space, which is the rarest. Alteans have a democratic monarchy, where the king presides over an elected parliament. Few outsiders are allowed on Altea.
Max Lifespan of 810 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1100 lbs.
Max Speed of 30 mph.
Natural Environment is Temperate Grasslands.

quarian.text:
Quarian
Quarians are native to Rannoch, an arid and dry, yet habitable world. Quarians are very similar to humans, but due to their weak immune systems, they must wear a special biosuit 95% of the time, only taking it off for short intervals while in sterilized environments. Quarians are well known for their engineering capabilities and resourcefulness.They tend to be distrustful of A.l.s, especially those not in Android bodies.
Quarians are also nomadic, the majority of their species living in an enormous fleet that flies through space.
Max Lifespan of 130 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1000 lbs.
Max Speed of 27 mph.
Natural Environment is Dry and Arid.

celestial.text:
Celestial
Little is known about these mysterious beings, as the large, dense nebula in which they are known to live in is very dangerous, and difficult to navigate.They are known to be made out of the same gas that makes up their nebula, and they seem to be held together by psionic force alone.They are incredibly powerful psionics, but they maintain a belief system very much like human Buddhism.The majority of Celestials are pacifist, and they also rarely leave their nebula, spending most of their time meditating.
Max Lifespan of ??? years.
Max Lifting Strength of ??? lbs.
Max Speed of ??? mph.
Natural Environment is Space Gas.

kitsune.text:
Kitsune
The Kitsune are a race of bipedal humanoids who appear very similar to earth foxes.
What’s unique about them is their ability to shapeshift.They can become indistinguishable from any human, asari, gray. etc.They cannot mimic specific people, just a specific humanoid species.They are incredibly secretive, to the point where nobody is exactly sure where their homeworldTaya is.What is known is that they seem to be working on enhancing the agents that they send out into the galaxy, creating something akin to Super Soldiers.
Max Lifespan of 400 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1200 lbs.
Max Speed of 38 mph.
Natural Environment is Temperate Forests.

turian.text:
Turian
Turians are a race of stoic, militaristic avian humanoids.They value military strength, honor, and discipline. All turians have a thin natural carapace that is a mixture of organic metal and bone, that helps shield them from the radiation of their sun, due to their planets weak magnetic fields not blocking all of it They have sharp teeth, and vicious talons on their hands and feet implying that this species evolved as carnivorous predators.Turians have a very large military force, due to a race-wide law that requires all citizens to spend at least 10 years in the military.
Max Lifespan of 130 years.
Max Lifting Strength of 1400 lbs.
Max Speed of 30 mph.
Natural Environment is Varied, usually Temperate.

typhon.text:
Typhon
Very little is known about these monstrous shapeshifters, but we do know that they have stripped once-prosperous worlds barren, and left them empty and dead.They are very powerful, as they can shapeshift, survive the vacuum of space, apparently don’t age, and they possess psionic abilities.They also have no empathy; they are physically incapable of it. Tests have shown thatTyphon-Human hybrids could experience empathy, and thus be reasoned with, but nothing has come of that yet. If you see one of these, do not engage.
Leave the area/ship/planet immediately.
Max Lifespan of ??? Years.
Max Lifting Strength of ??? lbs.
Max Speed of ??? mph.
